t:
I spent all my life pretending that I was deaf.



So, now I don't know what to do after hearing my wife planning to kill me.
c:
The problem is that she told me she was mute.



#pretend #deaf #wife #plan #murder #surprise #afraid #careful





https://www.masaadernews.com/en/article/24722/a-man-pretends-of-deafness-and-dumbness-for-62-years-to-avoid-talking-to-his-wife/
That might be fake, but it was a nice idea.
